reg_info.act_under: Homes for the Aged and Rest Homes Act   Loi sur les foyers pour personnes âgées et les maisons de repos

content.content: 1. A temporary decrease between January 1, 2003 and June 30, 2005 in the number of residents residing in a home classified as a “B”, “C” or “D” home is prescribed as an extraordinary event in respect of which the Minister may make an additional grant to a municipality maintaining and operating a home, to the municipalities maintaining and operating a joint home or to a board of management of a home for the purposes of section 29 of the Act. O. Reg. 429/02, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. A temporary decrease between January 1, 2003 and June 30, 2005 in the number of residents residing in a home classified as a “B”, “C” or “D” home is prescribed as an extraordinary event in respect of which the Minister may make an additional grant to a municipality maintaining and operating a home, to the municipalities maintaining and operating a joint home or to a board of management of a home for the purposes of section 29 of the Act. O. Reg. 429/02, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for the revocation of this Regulation). O. Reg. 429/02, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for the revocation of this Regulation). O. Reg. 429/02, s. 2.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 429/02, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 429/02, s. 3.
